product_name: Showers Pass Crossover Bike Jacket - Women's
long_description: Designed to give you waterproof, breathable coverage for bike riding, the Showers Pass Crossover jacket is versatile enough to wear on your walks and errands, too. Relaxed fit lets you wear a sweater underneath. Zippered core vents. Dropped rear hem for bike-riding coverage. No pockets on the back gives it a sleek look for off-bike activities. The Showers Pass Crossover jacket has an attached hood, ample reflective trim and 2 zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Designed to give you waterproof, breathable coverage for bike riding, the Showers Pass Crossover jacket is versatile enough to wear on your walks and errands, too.
